directions.step:
Beat 2 egg whites until frothy. Add 1/8 teaspoon cream of tartar, then gradually beat in 1 cup packed C&H Golden Brown Sugar. Continue to beat until stiff. Spread over unbaked cake batter in pan. Sprinkle with 1/4 cup finely chopped walnuts. Bake with cake as directed. Enough to cover one 13 x 9-inch cake Recipe By : "Brown Sugar Recipe Bonanza," the C and H Sugar Kitchen
Posted to EAT-L Digest 16 October 96
Date: Thu, 17 Oct 1996 07:27:52 -0400
From: "Sharon L. Nardo" <snardo@ONRAMP.NET>
